def_cn: 行吟诗人，民谣歌手(12、13 世纪周游意大利及法国为贵族表演的诗人或歌手)
def_en: Troubadours were poets and singers who used to travel around and perform to noble families in Italy and France in the twelfth and thirteenth centuries.

def_cn: (尤指歌词在音乐中至关重要的)流行歌手
def_en: People sometimes refer to popular singers as troubadours, especially when the words of their songs are an important part of their music.
